description:
**Urban Farmers Pro: Cultivating Sustainable Solutions**

Founded seven years ago as a university project, Urban Farmers Pro aimed to provide chemical-free, year-round food access. In October 2021, a third partner joined the project, formalizing the venture. Since 2022, they have been developing hydroponic containers, now operating two, dedicated to lettuce cultivation. Their journey highlights a commitment to urban agriculture innovation for a sustainable future, ensuring fresh produce for urban communities.
name: Urban Farmers Pro
